channel.title: Pasión de Las Pasiones — El Crucero
channel.description:
This is a loosely-connected two-shot, and the sessions are scheduled for 3 hours. Attendance of both sessions is fun, but not mandatory. You have to RSVP to each session you want to join.
Grab your ticket, pack your bag, and make sure you don't forget the mysterious letter your late grandmother gave you on her deathbed, because it's time to board the CCF Grandiosa in these all-new episodes of *Amores del Mar*, the third hottest cruise-themed telenovela on air.
Pasión de las Pasiones is a Powered by the Apocalypse system built to capture the feeling of Latin American telenovelas. We'll play a story of "drama, intrigue, lies and betrayal" set entirely aboard a cruise ship making its way through the blue waters of the Caribbean Sea.
The X-card will be used, and we will be observing the Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy (http://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html).
[Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LbjK_wkUN5kg8RxWAhc) [date=2019-04-23 time=20:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"] → [date=2019-04-23 time=23:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LbjKw4dxwD-skI9yqAF) [date=2019-04-30 time=20:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"] → [date=2019-04-30 time=23:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"]

@DavidMorrison wrote:

I am very tempted despite the interference of timezones… I think I’ll see how I’m feeling later if someone hasn’t snagged it before then
